original_definition: 'minimum temperature' means the minimum temperature inside a compartment during storage testing, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
generated_definition: 'minimum temperature' means the lowest temperature recorded or required to be maintained in a given environment, system or process.

Article 2: ‘minimum temperature’ (Tmin) means the minimum temperature inside a compartment during storage testing, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
‘minimum temperature’ (Tmin) means the minimum temperature inside acompartment during storage testing, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
